import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{PostWrapper}from"./style";import{getListPostRequest,getPostIdRequest}from"./actions";import{connect}from"react-redux";import{selectIsLoading,selectPostDetail,selectError,selectPosts}from"./selector";import{NavLink}from"react-router-dom";import PostItem from'./../Home/Component/Post';import Loading from"../Components/Loading";import Button from"./../../Component/Button";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Post=function Post(props){var handleGetListPost=props.handleGetListPost,isLoading=props.isLoading,posts=props.posts,postDetail=props.postDetail,history=props.history;useEffect(function(){handleGetListPost();},[]);if(isLoading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loading,{});// link toi post detail
var handleClickToPostDetail=function handleClickToPostDetail(postId){history.push("/tin-tuc/".concat(postId));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(PostWrapper,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{exact:true,to:"/",className:"link-to",children:"Trang chu\u0309"}),"/",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"T\xE2\u0301t ca\u0309 tin t\u01B0\u0301c"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"title-page",children:"T\xE2\u0301t ca\u0309 tin t\u01B0\u0301c"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:posts.map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PostItem,{className:"col-lg-3 col-md-4 col-sm-6",postItem:item,onClick:function onClick(){return handleClickToPostDetail(item.id);}},item.id);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{name:"Xem th\xEAm b\xE0i vi\u1EBFt",type:"add"})]})]});};var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{posts:selectPosts(state),postDetail:selectPostDetail(state),isLoading:selectIsLoading(state),error:selectError(state)};};var mapDispatch=function mapDispatch(dispatch){return{handleGetListPost:function handleGetListPost(){return dispatch(getListPostRequest());}};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatch)(Post);
